Shake 'n Bake - Wikipedia
s: March 5, 2025 - Shake 'n Bake is a seasoned breadcrumb coating originally marketed to mimic the flavor and texture of fried chicken. Introduced in 1965 by General Foods, it is currently made under the Kraft Heinz brand.
